name: MovieClipsTrivia
0:
”Alexa, play Movie Clips Trivia”
”Alexa, launch Movie Clips Trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie clips trivia
des:
Simply listen to Alexa as she plays you a set of audio clips from your favorite movies. Try your best to guess which movies these clips came from. Just reply with your answer, or that you give up and don't know. Invite your friends over to help you guess the movies. Good luck!

This skill does not have Alexa read the quotes, it uses a rich audio clip database of over 100 movie clips.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
